title: Will Facebook Apologize Now? | Guest: Jason Whitlock | 5/27/21
description:
Glenn has some questions for the Biden administration as it baselessly paints conservatives as extremists following the Jan. 6 Capitol riot. The TSA is now handling mask violations the same as firearm violations. Biden’s pick to lead the ATF wants to ban AR-15s. Schools are lowering the standards for people of color in the medical field as well as implementing a racial equity plan. Glenn got an interesting early Father’s Day gift. Journalist Jason Whitlock visits to share the story of why former NBA player Kwame Brown is speaking out, and why it gives him hope. Glenn and Jason discuss the evidence that COVID-19 may have escaped from a lab as Facebook reverses its ban on posts claiming the virus is man-made.
